Sample data from the Diagnostic Assessment and Achievement of College Skills (DAACS)

Source: R/data-daacs.R
daacs.Rd

Sample data from the Diagnostic Assessment and Achievement of College Skills (DAACS)

Usage

daacs_data

daacs_codings

daacs_text_responses

daacs_rubric

Format

Data frames.

An object of class data.frame with 311 rows and 8 columns.

An object of class data.frame with 5 rows and 4 columns.

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 10 rows and 4 columns.

Source

https://daacs.net

https://docs.daacs.net/overview/assessments/writing/

About DAACS

This is a small subset of essays, essay scores, and self-regulated learning results from the Diagnostic Assessment and Achievement of College Skills (DAACS). DAACS is a suite of technological and social supports to optimize student learning. DAACS provides personalized feedback about students' strengths and weaknesses in terms of key academic and self-regulated learning skills, linking them to the resources to help them be successful students.

These data are a subset of essays used in ChingYen et al (2023) College Students' Responses to Automated Feedback on Self-Regulated Learning.

daacs_data Structure

  • id integer

  • qda_text character

  • content_summary numeric

  • content_suggestions numeric

  • organization_structure numeric

  • organization_transitions numeric

  • paragraphs_ideas numeric

  • paragraphs_cohesion numeric

  • sentences_correct numeric

  • sentences_complexity numeric

  • conventions_usage numeric

  • conventions_punctuation numeric

  • motivation numeric

  • strategies numeric

  • metacognition numeric

  • selfefficacy numeric

daacs_coding Structure

  • coding_id integer

  • coder character

  • id integer

  • text character

  • codes character

  • Content of Essay character

  • Does this text represent a character

  • Judgment about survey or feedback character

daacs_text_responses Structure

  • id integer

  • stem character

  • answer character

  • coder character
